ai-mil7.7.1:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what is the same thing?”
ai-mil7.7.1:1.2_0: “And soon as he’s put on a spoon ball cart, the monkey, chickle, or he smeared it on the bank of the river.
ai-mil7.7.1:1.3_0: In the same way, the meditator’s mind is guarded by the six doors beginning with the opposite sex. Their mindfulness is tied up in the middle of the body after getting stressed.
ai-mil7.7.1:1.4_0: Now, great king, this is the bag of the winter of the Ganges:
ai-mil7.7.1:2.3_0: if only the tips of defilements are worn;
ai-mil7.7.1:2.4_0: one should remove craving for them.’”
ai-mil7.7.1:3.1_0: the first Questioning around the broad (birth),
